Index list

Source: R/nse-index.R
nse_index_list.Rd

List NSE indices.

nse_index_list(clean_names = TRUE)

Arguments

clean_names

Logical; if TRUE, makes the column names descriptive and uses snake_case.

Value

A tibble with the following column:

index_name

Name of the index.

Examples

# \donttest{
nse_index_list()

#>           index_name
#> 1  NIFTY 50 Pre Open
#> 2           NIFTY 50
#> 3      NIFTY NEXT 50
#> 4    NIFTY100 LIQ 15
#> 5         NIFTY BANK
#> 6          INDIA VIX
#> 7          NIFTY 100
#> 8          NIFTY 500
#> 9   NIFTY MIDCAP 100
#> 10   NIFTY MIDCAP 50
#> 11       NIFTY INFRA
#> 12      NIFTY REALTY
#> 13      NIFTY ENERGY
#> 14        NIFTY FMCG
#> 15         NIFTY MNC
#> 16      NIFTY PHARMA
#> 17         NIFTY PSE
#> 18    NIFTY PSU BANK
#> 19 NIFTY SERV SECTOR
#> 20          NIFTY IT
#> 21  NIFTY SMLCAP 100
#> 22         NIFTY 200
#> 23        NIFTY AUTO
#> 24       NIFTY MEDIA
#> 25       NIFTY METAL
#> 26 NIFTY DIV OPPS 50
#> 27 NIFTY COMMODITIES
#> 28 NIFTY CONSUMPTION
#> 29        NIFTY CPSE
#> 30 NIFTY FIN SERVICE
#> 31 NIFTY GROWSECT 15
#> 32  NIFTY50 VALUE 20
#> 33 NIFTY50 TR 2X LEV
#> 34 NIFTY50 PR 2X LEV
#> 35 NIFTY50 TR 1X INV
#> 36 NIFTY50 PR 1X INV
#> 37    NIFTY ALPHA 50
#> 38   NIFTY50 EQL WGT
#> 39  NIFTY100 EQL WGT
#> 40 NIFTY100 LOWVOL30
#> 41  NIFTY MID LIQ 15
#> 42    NIFTY PVT BANK
#> 43 NIFTY100 QUALTY30
#> 44   NIFTY GS 8 13YR
#> 45     NIFTY GS 10YR
#> 46 NIFTY GS 10YR CLN
#> 47    NIFTY GS 4 8YR
#> 48  NIFTY GS 11 15YR
#> 49 NIFTY GS 15YRPLUS
#> 50 NIFTY GS COMPSITE
#> 51  NIFTY MIDCAP 150
#> 52   NIFTY SMLCAP 50
#> 53  NIFTY SMLCAP 250
#> 54  NIFTY MIDSML 400
#> 55 NIFTY200 QUALTY30

# retain original column names as returned by NSE
nse_index_list(clean_names = FALSE)

#>                 name
#> 1  NIFTY 50 Pre Open
#> 2           NIFTY 50
#> 3      NIFTY NEXT 50
